narrative.act_1: Legacy 16-color ANSI palettes are limiting the TUI's visual potential.
narrative.act_2: Build a HEX interpolation engine and MultiGradient palette system to support TrueColor.
narrative.act_3: Implement 15 brand new, highly expressive animations like Aurora, Matrix Rain, and Synthwave.
narrative.act_4: The TUI banner and logo now exhibit stunning 24-bit color transitions.
narrative.act_5: This foundation enables a new level of visual polish for the terminal interface.
